abstract: silicom given buy rating at needham & company llc .
article: needham & company llc reiterated their buy rating on shares of silicom in a research report sent to investors on friday , marketbeat . com reports . the brokerage currently has a $ 90.00 price target on the technology company 's stock , up from their previous price target of $ 75.00 . separately , bidaskclub downgraded silicom from a buy rating to a hold rating in a research report on thursday , december 7th . silicom traded up $ 2.16 during trading on friday , hitting $ 74.14 . the stock had a trading volume of 83,400 shares , compared to its average volume of 61,933 .

silicom has a 52 week low of $ 34.86 and a 52 week high of $ 77.95 . the firm has a market capitalization of $ 551.90 , a p/e ratio of 35.30 and a beta of 1.38 . silicom last posted its earnings results on wednesday , october 25th . the technology company reported $ 0.75 eps for the quarter , beating the consensus estimate of $ 0.71 by $ 0.04 . silicom had a return on equity of 12.77 % and a net margin of 13.68 % . the company had revenue of $ 32.30 million for the quarter , compared to the consensus estimate of $ 31.11 million .

during the same quarter in the prior year , the business earned $ 0.53 earnings per share . the firm 's revenue for the quarter was up 30.8 % on a year-over-year basis . several institutional investors have recently bought and sold shares of silc . etf managers group llc acquired a new position in shares of silicom in the second quarter valued at approximately $ 120,000 . ghp investment advisors inc. . acquired a new stake in silicom during the third quarter worth approximately $ 253,000 . national investment services inc. . wi grew its position in silicom by 71.0 % during the fourth quarter .

national investment services inc. . wi now owns 6,682 shares of the technology company 's stock worth $ 468,000 after buying an additional 2,774 shares in the last quarter . oxford asset management llp acquired a new stake in silicom during the third quarter worth approximately $ 533,000 . finally , citadel advisors llc acquired a new stake in silicom during the third quarter worth approximately $ 534,000 . 25.29 % of the stock is currently owned by institutional investors . trademark violation warning : `` silicom given buy rating at needham & company llc '' was first published by watch list news and is owned by of watch list news .

if you are accessing this piece of content on another publication , it was stolen and reposted in violation of u. s. & international copyright law . the original version of this piece of content can be accessed at company profilesilicom ltd. . is engaged in the design , manufacture , marketing and support of networking and data infrastructure solutions for a range of servers , server-based systems and communications devices . the company 's products include server network interface cards with and without bypass ; intelligent and programmable cards , with features , such as encryption , acceleration , data compression , redirection , time stamping , network capture solutions , field programmable gate array based ultra-low latency solutions , and/or other offload features and/or compute blades , and standalone products .
